ovdesc.p: This application holds the list of Blacklist Customer, received from various sources. This table is referred to, when there is a blacklist check done for a customer during Onboarding process workflow

desc.p: Specifies the record entry date, Input Standard date format in T24.
Specifies the Legal ID reference number.
Specifies the Date of Birth of the Customer, Input standard date format in T24.
Specifies the First name of the Customer.
Specifies the Full name of the Customer.
Specifies the last review date, for the record.
Specifies the reviewer name, Input Alphanumeric.
Specifies the alias name for the Customer, if provided.
Specifies the alias name for the Customer, if provided.
Specifies the alias name for the Customer, if provided.
Specifies the source reference name from which the data record was provided.
Specifies the Short name of the Customer.
Specifies the Surname of the Customer, the field stores different Surname for the given first and last name.
Specifies the Legal ID Type, includes Income tax id, License, National Id and Passport.
